attributes.action: Make bullying a criminal offence we need stronger laws for bullies at school.
attributes.background: Bullying is becoming more common and nearly everyday there is news on bullies bullying innocent children.The School should be a safe environment,children are being abused by bullies. These bullies are getting a slap on the wrist and getting away with it. Do something to make a change!

rejection.details:
We think that your petition is similar to the following petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/161936

You may wish to consider signing this petition.
